methods.name: newAlert
methods.rawDocumentation:
Create a new HSAlert object
- Returns: An HSAlert object

methods.name: showAlert
methods.rawDocumentation:
Show an HSAlert object
- Parameter alert: The HSAlert object to show

methods.name: show
methods.rawDocumentation:
Show an alert to the user
- Parameter message: The text to include in the alert
methods.description: Show an alert to the user

properties.name: message
properties.rawDocumentation: The message to display in an alert
properties.description: The message to display in an alert

properties.name: expire
properties.rawDocumentation: How many seconds the alert should be shown for
properties.description: How many seconds the alert should be shown for

properties.name: font
properties.rawDocumentation: An HSFont describing the font to use in the alert
properties.description: An HSFont describing the font to use in the alert

properties.name: padding
properties.rawDocumentation: How many points of padding to use in the alert
properties.description: How many points of padding to use in the alert
